garlic.exc¶

Implementation of exceptions

..currentmodule:: garlic.exc

Exceptions

BadRequest(response)

400 Bad Request: The request for a known resource could not be processed because of bad syntax.

HTTPError(response)

Base exception for all HTTP related errors.

InternalServerError(response)

500 Internal Server Error: There is an unspecific problem with the server which the service operator may not yet be aware of.

NotFound(response)

404 Not Available: The request could not be processed because the requested resource could not be found.

ServiceUnavailable(response)

503 Service Unavailable: The server is temporarily down for maintenance, or there is a temporary problem with the server that the service operator is already aware of.
exception garlic.exc.HTTPError(response)[source]¶

Bases: Exception

Base exception for all HTTP related errors.

Parameters

response (Response) – Response object accompanying the http error.

with_traceback()¶

Exception.with_traceback(tb) – set self.__traceback__ to tb and return self.
